item.title: Design Thinking
item.description: What is Design Thinking? (Design Thinking)[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Design_thinking] was originally developed as a process for creative designers but has wider business and social applications. Why use it? It is a positive, creative approach for the initial parts of solution development. It is a good way of getting fresh, new ideas into an existing organisation. Thinking outside of the box is one way of describing it. Related Practices It can be used as part of a (Discovery Session)[.
